Class DevViewerLogin

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • colla.appl.developer_viewer.DevViewerLogin

  • public class DevViewerLogin
extends java.util.Observable
    This class deals with the communications between server and client during login.
    Author:
    Diogo Matos
